data.title: Who are Steven Tyler's kids?
data.meta_description: STEVEN Tyler has had a long-running career in the entertainment industry.Over the years, Aerosmith's lead singer started a family and had four kids, m
data.text:
STEVEN Tyler has had a long-running career in the entertainment industry.

Over the years, Aerosmith's lead singer started a family and had four kids, many of which have also had successful Hollywood careers.

Who are Steven Tyler's kids?

Steven Tyler, 75, has three daughters and one son.

His four kids include Liv Tyler, 45; Mia Tyler, 44; Chelsea Tyler, 34; and Taj Monroe Tallarico, 32.

Liv was born on July 1, 1977, in New York City, while Mia was born on December 22, 1978, in Lebanon, New Hampshire.

Chelsea was born on March 6, 1989, in Boston, Massachusetts, and Taj was born on January 31, 1991, in Boston.

Liv's mother is singer and model Bebe Buell, and Mia's mother is late actress and model Cyrinda Foxe.

Steven welcomed both Chelsea and Taj with fashion designer Teresa Barrick.

Liv Tyler

Liv has made her own name in Hollywood through her successful acting career. The former model is also a singer and a producer.

She was married to English musician Royston Langdon from 2003 to 2009. They share an 18-year-old son named Milo William Langdon.

She also shares two children with her sports agent ex Dave Gardner, including son Sailor Gene Gardner, eight, and daughter Lula Rose Gardner, six.

Mia Tyler

Mia has also pursued an acting and modeling career.

She tied the knot with drummer and actor David Buckner in 2003, but the pair split in 2005.

The actress shares a five-year-old son named Axton Joseph with her boyfriend, Dan Halen.

Chelsea Tyler

Like her famous father, Chelsea is a musician.

She wed actor Jon Foster in 2015. The duo has a band together called KANEHOLLER.

The pair have a son named Vincent Frank Foster, three.

Taj Monroe Tallarico

Taj has kept a lower profile than his siblings. However, he did dabble in acting as a kid.

As reported by MTV, he was featured in a Christmas episode of Disney Channel's Lizzie McGuire along with his dad and sister Chelsea.

According to his Facebook page, he tied the knot with Brittany Reardon in 2018.

What has Steven Tyler said about his kids?

In January 2018, Steven spoke to PEOPLE about spending time with his kids during the holidays despite their busy schedules.

The New York native said: "Right now, I'm still really busy. Liv is in England ‚Äî I went and saw her last year with the whole family. It's just a little hard.

"We try to get together for Christmas and it's fun, it's beautiful. What we got is beautiful."

On March 6, 2022, Steven paid tribute to Chelsea's birthday in an Instagram post.

He wrote: "‚ù§Ô∏èüéÇ @chelsannat HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE BADDEST BABY GIRL PUP!!! I LOVE YOU CHELS‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è."

On May 9, 2021, he honored his daughters for Mother's Day.

The proud father and grandfather captioned the sweet family collage: "MY PUPS... #HAPPYMOTHERSDAY ‚ù§Ô∏è."

Is Steven Tyler married?

Though he is not currently married, Steven has walked down the aisle twice.

He and Cyrinda wed in 1978 and went their separate ways in 1987.

In 1988, he tied the knot with Teresa, and the former couple stayed together until 2006.

He is now dating his former personal assistant Aimee Preston, who is 40 years his junior.
